To check ur effective #Grin hashrate (GPS) @Grinmint1 (hashrate is based on # of valid shares submitted):
    1. Take N, the # of shares submitted in last hr
    2. Compute: GPS = D*42*N/3600, D is pool difficulty
Don't take what ur mining software tells you at face value: Verify

1088478140488245248.text:
To accurately calculate effective hashrate, use shares submitted, not the GPS as reported by mining software and pools (which are often padded): 

       N = number of shares submitted in the last hr
       D = pool difficulty (currently 4 for Grin)
       GPS = D*42*N/3600
